channel.title: Adding in objects (very easy)
channel.description:
ok this is a very easy way as to adding in objects.
now follow what i say
source>client.java>ctrl + F>makeGlobalObject (keep doing that until u see something that looks like this [code]makeGlobalObject(3084, 3490, 2561, -4, 10); // Stall makeGlobalObject(3084, 3495, 2562, -4, 10); // Stall makeGlobalObject(3090, 3512, 2213, 0, 10); // Bank makeGlobalObject(3085, 3512, 2213, 0, 10); // Bank[/code]
ill explain what theese mean
this makes te object [code]makeGlobalObject[/code]
theese are the co ords (first one is X and the second one is Y [code]3085, 3512[/code]
this is the item id
[code]2213[/code]
then this is the way that the item is facing [code]0[/code] for example -1 -2 -3
ok now add one of theese [code]makeGlobalObject(3085, 3512, 2213, 0, 10);[/code] edit it , to your coords , save it ,compile and then restart your server and it should be in the place that you want.
thanks for reading
post what you think :D

item.title: Adding in objects (very easy)
item.dc:creator: @mursanari mursanari
item.description:
@mursanari wrote:

ok this is a very easy way as to adding in objects.

now follow what i say

source>client.java>ctrl + F>makeGlobalObject (keep doing that until u see something that looks like this

makeGlobalObject(3084, 3490, 2561, -4, 10); // Stall makeGlobalObject(3084, 3495, 2562, -4, 10); // Stall makeGlobalObject(3090, 3512, 2213, 0, 10); // Bank makeGlobalObject(3085, 3512, 2213, 0, 10); // Bank

ill explain what theese mean

this makes te object

makeGlobalObject

theese are the co ords (first one is X and the second one is Y

3085, 3512

this is the item id

2213

then this is the way that the item is facing

0

for example -1 -2 -3

ok now add one of theese

makeGlobalObject(3085, 3512, 2213, 0, 10);

edit it , to your coords , save it ,compile and then restart your server and it should be in the place that you want.

thanks for reading

post what you think
